 2018-06272018-05-29,  PMO,  ,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of LEA MACKENZIE of Chelsea, Quebec, as a special adviser to the Minister of Foreign Affairs, to be styled Special Adviser for Indigenous Issues at the United Nations, in New York, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, effective June 18, 2018.
